channel.title: Need help with adding new crown codes from MODICONS1 etc!
channel.description: Well i want to change the mod icon to donor so people know whos a donor and so forth, But i don't know how to change it so i can find out the path that i need to use to change the mod icon so i can name a picture so MODICON0 and it'll be donor icon, I've tryed to dl Toms suite editor but the dl is not found on the site and was wondering if i can get it somewhere else, ive googled it for about 20 minutes now but havnt found it, Help me please.

item.title: Need help with adding new crown codes from MODICONS1 etc!
item.dc:creator: @hyphy_ftw hyphy ftw
item.description:
@hyphy_ftw wrote:

You just change it so donor is rights 1 mod rights 2 and admin/co/owner rights 3 and make custom crowns for em, thats why i need the cache editor

Read full topic
